name: 李春穎
objective: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力、應變及變形，莫耳圓、壓力容器、樑、柱。
schedule:
1.　　Introduction
2.　　Tension, Compression, and Shear
3.　　Axially Loaded Members
4.　　Torsion
5.　　Bending of Beams
6.　　Shear Force and Bending Moment
7.　　Stresses in Beams Analysis of Stress
scorePolicy:
1. 第1次期中考   30%
2. 第2次期中考   30%
3. 平時出席表現  10%
4. 期末考        30%
materials:
教科書：Mechanics of Materials- An Integrated Learning System, by T.M. Philpot, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., 2008, 歐亞書局代理

參考書：Mechanics of Materials, by F.B. Beer, E.R. Johnston, Jr. and J.T. DeWolf, 3rd edition, McGraw-Hill Com., 新月圖書代理
參考書：Mechanics of Materials, by Gere & Timoshenko, 4rd edition
Mechanics of Materials, by R.C. Hibbeler, 6th edition
Mechanics of Materials- An Integrated Learning System, by T.A. Philpot, 歐亞書局
